question:
Dinda    (run) so fast because there
(be) a dog
Mia and her friend
(borrow) some books from the library
The school janitor
(sweep) the floor last night.
Mr Betty
(teach) and
(speak) English in the class.
My family
(miss) the plane because we (wake up) late​

answers.answer:
Dinda is running so fast because there is a dog

Mia and her friends are borrowing some books from the library

The school janitor was sweeping the floor last night

My Betty teaches and speaks English in the class

My Family missed the plane because we woke up late

related_questions.question: My name is irene. i am twenty one years old. i am tall and slim. my hair is black and curly. my nose is sharp and my skin is white. i work for a big company in semarang. my job is to make a minute in meeting, type letters, manage the director’s daily agenda and select guest who want to meet my director. what does her hair look like?

Permisi kakak kakak 
 apa ya bedanya which sama who ??

answers.answer:
which itu artinya yang mana

who itu artinya siapa

related_questions.question:
No    Plural
Meaning
1.
Bottle
2.
Sheep
3.
Cup
4.
Plate
5
Bowl
6
Liter
7.
Book
8.
Box
9.
Baby
10
Potato
11.
Dog
12.
Toy
13
Table
14.
Window
15.
Door
16.
Leaf
17.
Bus
18.
Watch
19.
Wife
20.
Woman​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Plural form

1. Bottle - Bottles

2. Sheep - Sheep

3. Cup - Cups

4. Plate - Plates

5. Bowl - Bowls

6. Liter - Liters

7. Book - Books

8. Box - Boxes

9. Baby - Babies

10. Potato - Potatoes

11. Dog - Dogs

12. Toy - Toys

13. Table - Tables

14. Window - Windows

15. Door - Doors

16. Leaf - Leaves

17. Bus - Buses

18. Watch - Watches

19. Wife - Wives

20. Woman - Women

Penjelasan:

Plural form adalah bentuk kata benda yang mempunyai jumlah lebih dari satu atau banyak. misalnya :

satu buku - dua buku = one book - two books

penambahan akhiran dengan huruf s atau es, contohnya : flower-flowers,box-boxes

ada beberapa yang berubah kata atau malah tetap, contohnya : Man-Men,Child-Children,Mouse-Mice

leaf-leaves, wife-wives,

hope you find this helpful ^•^

Diana:the weather is nice. and it's a....daydesi:yes. lets play outdoor

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Diana:the weather is nice. and it's a sunny day

Desi: yes. lets play outdoor!

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan merupakan kata sifat (Adjective) yaitu sunny yang berarti cerah dan berfungsi untuk menjelaskan kata benda (Noun) day. Karena hari cerah, maka Desi mengajak untuk bermain di luar.

Semoga membantu ya.

a.he love his mother

Diketahui data Panjang sisi-sisi segitiga sebagai berikut :    6 cm, 8 cm, 10 cm

7 cm, 8 cm, 9 cm

9 cm, 12 cm, 15 cm

10 cm, 24 cm, 25 cm

Segitiga yang berbentuk siku-siku ditunjukkan nomor ….

A

2 dan 3

B

1 dan 3

C

1 dan 2

D

1 dan 4


​

answers.answer:
6 cm 8cm, 10 cm
Penjelasan:
Segitiga siku siku mempunyai rumus a^2 + b^2 = c^2
6 kuadrat + 8 kuadrat = 10 kuadrat
